explanation: [0-0] A man in a red shirt and black pants is sitting in the audience. The audience seats are yellow. Behind him are a man in a yellow shirt, a man in a black shirt, and a man in a black and red shirt. Further back, there's another man in a white shirt.
[0-2] The man raises his arms, clenches his fists, and appears increasingly excited. He opens his mouth, looking thrilled. The text on the screen reads "Punjab...".
